item.title: Marceline
item.media:title: Marceline
item.media:description:
Marceline from the Adventure Time. Wanted to try a bit more vintage style pin-up this time. 

lol... already guessed some will notice that how come she not burn in the sun. XD I myself realized it half way when drawing it. But well maybe she ate a magic strawberry that made her immune to sun for a day. Magic is answer to all the problems.

~~~

Rewards in Patreon: www.patreon.com/Foxilumi

 High-Resolution
 Lineart
 Process Steps
 PSD
 NSFW

Join this month to receive the rewards.

~~~

item.title: Happy Thoughts
item.media:title: Happy Thoughts
item.media:description:
Here's the final from Milo's Birthday episode! Thanks everyone who came to wish him a good day.  He's a big part of my life and the channel and im glad I can create him something. Last year he drew his new best friend and now she's 7 dog years older and has grown up! Had a lot of fun with it and was inspired by Studio Ghibli. Hope you guys enjoy it!  


 VIDEO: youtu.be/JK4D3UPWrNU  



*This video tutorial will be out on my Patreon soon! 

If you'd like to join our art community and participate in our monthly challenges, feel free to join our Discord! 
discord.gg/colordodge 



New Print Shop!: www.rossdraws.com/shop

Support me on Patreon for Tutorials and Goodies!
🔶 www.patreon.com/Rossdraws 🔶

YOUTUBE!!! 🔶 Instagram!🔶 Tutorial Store 🔶 Tumblr! 🔶 Facebook! 🔶

item.title: Robin Hood (2018) - Last arrow
item.media:title: Robin Hood (2018) - Last arrow
item.media:description:
Robin Hood the movie has been out for a while now but since I haven't posted anything here for a good while it's time to catch up! This is the work for that movie I made back in 2015. If I remember correctly that was actually my first blockbuster film project I worked on, that time I worked with Framestore guys on it and I still have sentiment to some of these concepts! 
I remember being impressed by "on point" art direction of Framestore Art director Martin Macrae and how it all was just so new to me. Definitely great times! 
In the end the movie probably took a bit different approach (haven't seen it yet) but it's always nice to see how things progress 
These are location sketches to showcase the palace/castle interior and its full color appeal 
All rights reserved ©Lionsgate.

MY NEWEST CONCEPT ART SCHOOL PROJECT!!! -------------> focalpointschool.com  


Follow me on:
Instagram--->>>>>> www.instagram.com/darekzabrock… 
Facebook--->>>>>> www.facebook.com/darek.zabrock…
Twitter--->>>>>> twitter.com/darekzabrocki

item.title: Where have Yellow-breasted Bunting gone?
item.media:title: Where have Yellow-breasted Bunting gone?
item.media:description:
The project is aimed at studying and conservation of Yellow-breasted Bunting, a small beautiful bird of the Emberizidae family, whose nesting area has catastrophically decreased over the past 30 years.

Being the one of the most wide spread bird species Yellow-breasted Bunting has drastically decreased in numbers and breeding range, disappeared from various Western breeding grounds. 

We are the team of researchers from Baikalsky State Nature Biosphere Reserve, Research Institute of Biology at Irkutsk State University and University of Münster want to study the current situation. 

Scientists assume that one of the main reasons of the Yellow-breasted Bunting population declining are the degradation of habitats and the direct prey of the species by humans in the migration stopovers and wintering grounds. Therefore, one of the priorities is the finding out places where Yellow-breasted Buntings are concentrating during migration and wintering. For these purposes, one of best methods is to put geolocators on birds - light sensors, which allow locating the birds by the length of the day. To obtain information from the sensor, the bird must be recaptured, therefore, individuals who have already occupied the nesting area are caught for research. This is due to the fact that Yellow-breasted Buntings have high breeding-site fidelity (the bird returns to the same nesting area from year to year). So we will be able to re-catch it after a year in the same place in order to remove the geolocator. This technique had been used in studying migration of similar species – Ortolan Bunting.

I drew it to help the project. You can learn more and support this project here: planeta.ru/campaigns/100599
item.description:
The project is aimed at studying and conservation of Yellow-breasted Bunting, a small beautiful bird of the Emberizidae family, whose nesting area has catastrophically decreased over the past 30 years.

Being the one of the most wide spread bird species Yellow-breasted Bunting has drastically decreased in numbers and breeding range, disappeared from various Western breeding grounds. 

We are the team of researchers from Baikalsky State Nature Biosphere Reserve, Research Institute of Biology at Irkutsk State University and University of Münster want to study the current situation. 

Scientists assume that one of the main reasons of the Yellow-breasted Bunting population declining are the degradation of habitats and the direct prey of the species by humans in the migration stopovers and wintering grounds. Therefore, one of the priorities is the finding out places where Yellow-breasted Buntings are concentrating during migration and wintering. For these purposes, one of best methods is to put geolocators on birds - light sensors, which allow locating the birds by the length of the day. To obtain information from the sensor, the bird must be recaptured, therefore, individuals who have already occupied the nesting area are caught for research. This is due to the fact that Yellow-breasted Buntings have high breeding-site fidelity (the bird returns to the same nesting area from year to year). So we will be able to re-catch it after a year in the same place in order to remove the geolocator. This technique had been used in studying migration of similar species – Ortolan Bunting.

I drew it to help the project. You can learn more and support this project here: planeta.ru/campaigns/100599

item.title: Monsters and Maidens - Bokoblin Business
item.media:title: Monsters and Maidens - Bokoblin Business
item.media:description:
Here we have a Bokoblin getting a little *too* fresh with the princess.   Do you think he knows what he has?   Or does he just see something tasty for dinner??   I'm not sure which fate is worse (Just kidding it's the dinner one please don't eat heeeeeeeer T^T )

This was for the Monsters and Maidens stream  (ﾉ´ヮ`)ﾉ*: ･ﾟ.   
I do like some high fantasy stuff cuz it gives me an excuse to draw some fun monsters!   Bokoblins have especially cool eyes, the colors are just wild.

Let's hope Link doesn't take a hundred years to rescue her o(>ω<)o

Thanks for stopping by! (´｡• ᵕ •｡`) ♡
- Heart


+++++++++Obligatory Patreon Plug+++++++++++
This is a Patreon Sponsored Illustration

If you join at the $5 level you get
 -All un-released patron exclusive art full rez

CLICK HERE TO JOIN

We will be releasing lo-res versions of Patron exclusive art every Monday at 5p EST.

I do like some high fantasy stuff cuz it gives me an excuse to draw some fun monsters!   Bokoblins have especially cool eyes, the colors are just wild.

item.title: Samurai Mune
item.media:title: Samurai Mune
item.media:description: Created with Dynamic Auto Painter X64 Pro 6 from a public domain image at Pixabay, post-processing done with IrfanView and PSP Pro 2019 Ultimate; applying the Joaquin HD - Bold style to the original image with DAP, I found the finished piece to be most intriguing and titled it for the Word Pictures Series...enjoy!
item.description: Created with Dynamic Auto Painter X64 Pro 6 from a public domain image at Pixabay, post-processing done with IrfanView and PSP Pro 2019 Ultimate; applying the Joaquin HD - Bold style to the original image with DAP, I found the finished piece to be most intriguing and titled it for the Word Pictures Series...enjoy!

item.title: Dead or Alive - Lovely Kokoro
item.media:title: Dead or Alive - Lovely Kokoro
item.media:description:
• I do not own anything; model belongs to: Tecmo Koei.


BASIC INFORMATION:

• Model ported by: rolance 

• Body pose made by: ShadowNinjaMaster (her face and hair posed by me).

• Programs used: 

            1. XPS 11.8
            2. 3DS max 2013 
            3. Photoshop CS6

Please, have some respect and:

            - Don't re-upload it on your own profile.

            - I don't mind to share link to this render on other websites.

            - Don't sell it for points or money.

            - Don't ask me about model.

            - I don't deal with any website to sell my arts. If you see any of my works on websites selling arts as posters for money, know it's illegal and I am not taking any money.

            - If you want to raise objections then feel free and write comment below. I have been opening for CONSTRUCTIVE critical remarks, there is no space for harassing or hate speech towards me or others.

Extra information:

            - I uploaded .jpg file which is lower quality than .png to load image faster for users with slower internet connection.
            - Image you can purchase for 600 points without logo and with better quality.
item.description:
• I do not own anything; model belongs to: Tecmo Koei.


BASIC INFORMATION:

• Model ported by: rolance 

• Body pose made by: ShadowNinjaMaster (her face and hair posed by me).

• Programs used: 

            1. XPS 11.8
            2. 3DS max 2013 
            3. Photoshop CS6

Please, have some respect and:

            - Don't re-upload it on your own profile.

            - I don't mind to share link to this render on other websites.

            - Don't sell it for points or money.

            - Don't ask me about model.

            - I don't deal with any website to sell my arts. If you see any of my works on websites selling arts as posters for money, know it's illegal and I am not taking any money.

            - If you want to raise objections then feel free and write comment below. I have been opening for CONSTRUCTIVE critical remarks, there is no space for harassing or hate speech towards me or others.

Extra information:

            - I uploaded .jpg file which is lower quality than .png to load image faster for users with slower internet connection.
            - Image you can purchase for 600 points without logo and with better quality.

item.title: [Happy Birthday] Inflame ( VRChat )
item.media:title: [Happy Birthday] Inflame ( VRChat )
item.media:description:
Hello everyone !!
It's been a while !

I'm sorry QwQ been super busy... And still busy ! trying to finish quickly commissions and raffle prize... Q-Q Sorry for taking so long !! I keep falling sick, and getting no motivation hhhhh T-T

That's a drawing i made quickly for a VRChat friend birthday in january !
